price: Safara guutaa; [haqa namaa] hir’iftoota irraa hin ta’inaa.
arabic: ۞ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡسِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: awfū al-kayla walā takūnū mina al-mukh'sirīna
